name: Snipper Gobbo - On Hold
description:
The Idea was to make a vn about a sniper happily going after contracts so she can get an artillery cannon for her own amusement.
Didn't even finish the first target, standing at 5.5 k words instead of the planned 10k per target.

Might finish this one later If I ever get the inspiration again, got a writer's block right now. And also the lack of assets doesn't really help either, don't got the money to comission everything :v

If any choice straight up takes you to the start menu it's because they don't do anything, sorry !
